entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
